name: Asociace pro mezinárodní otázky (Association for International Affairs)
goal: AMO is a non-governmental not-for-profit organization founded in 1997 in Prague to promote research and education in the field of international relations. This leading Czech foreign policy think-tank owes no allegiance to any political party or to any ideology. It aims to encourage pro-active approach to foreign policy issues; provide impartial analysis of international affairs; and facilitate an open space for informed discussion.
interests: Education, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Youth
euInitiatives:
Vzdělávací politika
Evropská zahraniční a bezpečnostní politika
Transformační politika
Evropská bezpečnostní a obranná politika
Východní partnerství
